text: Grupo Lala is a Mexican dairy company. It was founded in 1949 in Torreón, Coahuila. It is headquartered in Gómez Palacio, Durango. It is the largest dairy company in Latin America. Its name makes reference to its origin "La Laguna", a region located in Northern Mexico where the Mayran Lagoon is located. Category:Food companies Category:1949 establishments Category:Companies of Mexico
title: Grupo Lala
